name: Breeze (Mvine, MatK, Mandelbrottt, BathtubSloth, Kristian, Invizeron)
name_original: Breeze (Mvine, MatK, Mandelbrottt, BathtubSloth, Kristian, Invizeron)
description:
Swing around in this scenic grapplehook parkour time trial game developed by Jampacked. The game was developed over the course of a couple days for GradJam21

Marcus Vine - Art

Chris Grigor-Salas - Art

Kristian Menes - Sounds and Music

Myles Cragg - Programming

Mat Kostrzewa - Programming

Nathan Tuck - Level Design
